Bash(git -C "C:\\BrasilIntel\\mdinsights" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(07-02\): add Azure Blob backup manager with integrity verification

- Add Azure Storage config fields to Settings \(connection string, container, retention\)
- Create DatabaseBackupManager service class with backup/verify/upload/cleanup methods
- Use sqlite3 .backup\(\) API for safe online backups \(no exclusive lock\)
- Verify backup integrity with PRAGMA integrity_check before upload
- Support local-only mode when Azure not configured
- Cleanup old local backups \(7 days\) and Azure backups \(retention period\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\BrasilIntel\\mdinsights" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(07-01\): add structured logging and retry decorators

- Created app/logging_config.py with structlog + stdlib integration
- Configured daily log rotation \(30-day retention\) to data/logs/
- Added tenacity retry decorators to collector, classifier, emailer
- Retry logic: 3 attempts with exponential backoff \(4-30s collector, 2-15s classifier, 2-10s emailer\)
- main.py calls configure_logging at startup for both web and CLI modes
- All external API calls now retry on transient network/timeout errors
EOF
\)")

- Added comprehensive pipeline_summary log with all metrics
- Added global exception handler middleware for unhandled web server errors
- Context variables properly bound/unbound in finally block
- All pipeline steps now log duration_seconds for performance tracking
EOF
\)")

")

Bash(git -C "C:\\BrasilIntel\\mdinsights" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(07-03\): enhance health monitor with statistical thresholds and alert formatting

- Add statistics import for standard deviation calculations
- Calculate baseline_std using statistics.stdev\(\) for smarter thresholds
- Refine warning threshold: max\(baseline_avg - 2*std, baseline_avg * 0.3\)
- Add consecutive_low_runs counter for persistent problem detection
- Add baseline_std and threshold_value to returned dict for transparency
- Implement format_alert_email\(\) for HTML email with color-coded table
- Implement format_alert_summary\(\) for log-friendly text output
- Email includes critical/warning counts and detailed source table
- Inline CSS for email compatibility with Outlook/Gmail
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\BrasilIntel\\mdinsights" commit -m "feat\(07-04\): add standalone drift check script

- Runs all three drift checks \(confidence, role, category\)
- Human-readable console output with distribution statistics
- Sends email alert when drift detected \(if admin_email configured\)
- Exit codes: 0 \(OK\), 1 \(drift\), 2 \(insufficient data\)
- Ready for Task Scheduler integration
")

Bash(git -C "C:\\BrasilIntel\\mdinsights" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(07-05\): integrate backup and drift tasks into Task Scheduler

- Update setup_task.ps1 to register 4 scheduled tasks:
  * Pipeline: Daily at 06:00
  * Backup: Daily at 07:00 \(1h after pipeline\)
  * Drift Check: Weekly on Monday at 08:00
  * Monitor: Daily at 09:00 \(includes backup verification\)
- Add backup freshness check to check_last_run.py:
  * Verify latest backup <36h old
  * Check data/backups/ for mdinsights_*.db files
  * Alert if no backups or stale backups
- Validate backup_db.py and check_drift.py exist before task registration
- Add parameters: BackupTime, DriftDay, DriftTime

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\BrasilIntel\\mdinsights" tag -a v1.0.0 -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
MDInsights v1.0.0 — Production Release

Daily intelligence briefing system for Marsh stakeholders.
Transforms global insurance news into role-targeted, AI-classified,
priority-ranked HTML briefs delivered via Microsoft Graph email.

23 requirements satisfied across 8 phases:
- 18+ news sources via Apify + RSS
- GPT-4o 9-dimension classification \(priority, roles, entities, sentiment, impact, category, region, business line\)
- Role-tabbed HTML briefs with executive summaries, sector heatmap, entity tracker, market pulse
- Microsoft Graph email delivery with Marsh branding
- Admin dashboard \(Bootstrap 5 + HTMX\) for sources, recipients, archive, search
- Production hardening: structured logging, retry logic, database backup, health monitoring, drift detection
- Windows Task Scheduler automation \(4 scheduled tasks\)

39 plans executed in 7.2 hours. Zero open bugs.
EOF
\)")
